parameters.name: TolType
parameters.description: Tolerance type as defined by swGtolGeomCharSymbol_e (see Remarks )

title: IGtolFrame.GetFrameToleranceType
description: Gets the tolerance type of this Gtol frame.

parameters.name: TolType
parameters.description: Tolerance type as defined by swGtolGeomCharSymbol_e (see Remarks )

returns: True if Gtol frame tolerance type successfully retrieved, false if not
remarks:
TolType may be one of only swGtolGeomCharSymbol_e.:
swGcsANG
swGcsPARALLEL
swGcsPERP
swGcsCIRCRUNOUT
swGcsSYMMETRY
